markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Wrestler's Armbands](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2404)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Intelligent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=280" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 197 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armbands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +17; [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) vision 30 feet, [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) hearing 30 feet

**Communication** speech ([Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) and one other common or regional language)

**Skills** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Sports Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +17

**Int** +2, **Wis** +4, **Cha** +4

**Will** +17 

</column>

---        

_Wrestler's armbands_ are a set of _[armbands of athleticism](/Equipment.aspx?ID=409)_ that have gained their own boisterous sapience. Often, such items aren't created intentionally but rather are the result of a truly charismatic champion whose heart and body are unusually strong wearing the _armbands of athleticism_ on many adventures as their most important item. Eventually, the essence of their earnest and adventurous spirit has so thoroughly inundated the item it gains a matching spirit and will of its own. Such armbands view themselves as a tough, but fair, trainer for whomever inherits them next, inspiring you to new heights of athleticism. They also spoil for contests, telepathically calling out competitors on your behalf; typically the armbands won't challenge a foe you're unprepared to face, but particularly eager wrestler's armbands might have an unfortunate habit of overestimating your abilities and pushing you into a conflict that's beyond your proven capacity. These armbands have the following activation.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per minute; **Trigger** You succeed or critically succeed at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check;  **Effect** The armbands taunt a creature you're competing with, boasting of your prowess and attempting an Intimidation check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) that creature.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wrestler's Armbands
